item.title: Geography - mismatch
item.description: For any fifth grader Mumbai is located in Western part of India if asked north or south answer will be south. So how can there be a church of North India which is located in posh south Mumbai in a stone throw distance from famous Flora Fountain? You may wonder - in the world of bharat-todo (Break India by new politicians) how all bhaia’s(people from North India Bihar and Uttarpradesh - speaking Hindi) suddenly built a church for themselves.
